rules_text:
Vigilance
At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more Spirits and/or creatures with flying, transform Haunted Waif.
rules_text2:
Vigilance
When this creature transforms into Geist Whisperer, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
At the beginning of your end step, untap all Spirits and creatures with flying you control.
